issue.title: created_by field for map is updated (and should not!)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When an existing map is updated, the created_by field is set to current user. It should not.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.4

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Fixed in my sandbox https://svn.easysdi.org/svn/easysdi/sandboxes/asit-vd/4.4.x (easier to merge) at rev. 10117.
